constituent: escort, send off, golden calf, horns, heavens, road
koohiiStory1: The St Bernard with devilish animal horns must be non other than Cerberus, guard dog of the netherworld. In this frame Cerberus is seen along the road to hell, escorting those who have been sent off to join Hades in his realm.
koohiiStory2: The woolly mammoth got quite a send off before he wandered up that road never to be seen alive again.
words:
運送(うんそう): shipping, marine transportation
回送(かいそう): forwarding
送金(そうきん): remittance, sending money
送り仮名(おくりがな): kana written after a kanji to complete the full (usually kun) reading of the word
送る(おくる): send (a thing), take or escort (a person somewhere), see off (a person), spend a period of time, live a life
送別(そうべつ): farewell, send-off
送料(そうりょう): postage
見送り(みおくり): seeing one off, farewell, escort
見送る(みおくる): see off, escort, let pass, wait and see
郵送(ゆうそう): mailing
輸送(ゆそう): transport, transportation
放送(ほうそう): broadcasting
